duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide assistance to the customer service team, pharmacy coordinators, pharmacists, and members in resolution of various pharmacy claims, pricing, coding issues.
Work with internal departments and external vendors to evaluate and resolve pharmacy-related issues.
Communicate pharmacy-related inquiries with members, providers, pharmacies, and groups regarding benefits.
Resolve claims and coverage issues while explaining proper claims submission procedures.
Coordinate the effective resolution of Pharmacy Benefits administration problems.
Maintain process for clinical overrides and QVT, Step Therapy, and prior-authorization efforts in the PBM claims systems for UM and Clinical Services.
Ensure the timely and accurate processing of overrides.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or a related health care field or 4 years of work experience in a pharmacy/health care/managed care industry
